score.title: the winner is...
paragraphs: Ten people came to the house, to become reality TV stars, to prove themselves worthy of win the prize money. It's been an incredible few weeks, but with the weakest links now already out of the house we're left with the strongest contenders. In its final week the audience will pick the inhabitant they find most worthy, and elect them the winner. As one of those inhabitants what will you do to ensure you stay in til the end?
This playset is based around around reality game shows like Big Brother, with the idea that some wannabe stars will take their ambitions a little too far in the desperate grasp to win.
